title: The Asset Allocator: Chile - A Value Country ETF
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Equity analyst Ian Bezek makes a solid case that Chilean stocks (ECH) have been oversold on political fears. This podcast (6:12) agrees with Bezek’s thesis and adds that the demonstrations in Chile are reminiscent of the yellow-vest protests in France, whose start was accompanied by a decline in the stock market, which then went on to recover and reach new highs. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
